Factsheet

Developer:
CrushPoint Games
Based in Portland, OR
Release date:
October 2019
Platforms:
Browser WebAssembly
Website:
crushpoint.games/launch/
Regular Price:
Free

Description

Launch is a 2D physics 0G jumping and climbing game programmed in Go WebAssembly and TypeScript React

History

Zero G Debris Climbing

Latching on floating debris and maintaining momentum

Features

  • Simple and zen gameplay
